sub_title: Supporting people discover and 𝙡𝙞𝙫𝙚 𝙩𝙝𝙚𝙞𝙧 𝙪𝙣𝙡𝙞𝙫𝙚𝙙 𝙡𝙞𝙛𝙚 | Transformation and Executive Coach (PCC) | Positive Psychology | Resilience | Public Speaker | Author
summary:
I help my clients discover and 𝙡𝙞𝙫𝙚 𝙩𝙝𝙚𝙞𝙧 𝙪𝙣𝙡𝙞𝙫𝙚𝙙 𝙡𝙞𝙛𝙚.

Follow me to benefit from weekly insights on how to use challenges as a catalyst for personal transformation.

► Who I am

I live in the Netherlands with my wife and 3 children. As a Transformation coach, I serve my clients to discover and live their unlived life. I bring disruption and insight, but also enthusiasm, lightness, and joie de vivre in my coaching.
By transforming their lives, they develop respectful relationships with themselves and bring creativity and energy to their communities to make the world a better place.

► The story of my unlived life.

A product of the French education system, I trained as an engineer with an MBA and ended-up working in large corporations as a commercial leader. I discovered my purpose to support people through coaching but it was neither convenient nor practical so I suppressed it for many years until I had a reckoning when I supported my wife for 3 years through her Leukaemia. At the end of the ordeal, I was depleted and burnt-out. The only thing left was my desire to rebuild myself and become a coach. I jumped into the unknown. I went back to university to study psychology, I became a certified coach and an entrepreneur. Today, I live my unlived life and I support my clients to live theirs!

► How to discover and live your unlived life?

With 𝙊𝙪𝙩𝙤𝙛𝘾𝙝𝙤𝙞𝙘𝙚, I offer individual and group coaching programs as well as retreats. They are grounded in positive psychology, embodiment coaching, neuroscience, and philosophy. I believe that life as a natural process is transformative and that external forces are always at play forcing us to change and adapt all the time. By consciously using this energy and disruption to co-create a personal transformation, my clients reach levels of being and doing that they barely thought possible. This is what living their unlived life is all about.

►Are you feeling stuck in your life journey? 
My invitation is to go and face it, clarify and understand what and why this is happening. Learn how to let go of it and replace it by new ways of being and doing which serve you better.

The Talmud asks:
If not Me, Who?
If not Now, When?

So, I ask: if you do not live your life who will?
And, I ask: how much more do you need to resist and suffer before you take action?

Right here and right now, you can start living your unlived life.

► 𝗪𝗮𝗻𝘁 𝘁𝗼 𝗸𝗻𝗼𝘄 𝗺𝗼𝗿𝗲❓
☞ outofchoice.co
✎ jc@outofchoice.co

► Specialties:
Transformation Coaching, Executive Coaching, Leadership, Positive Psychology, Strategy

treasury_media.title: How to build your Resilience Muscle? (ICF conference May 2023)
treasury_media.description:
What is Resilience? what are the components of it?
Why some people show resilience in the face of adversity while others crumble when faced with the same situations?
Is that a fixed traits of character or is it something which can be developed?

treasury_media.title: "And Now, What?": Intensive 10-Week Online Group Coaching for Self-Discovery and Transformation - Tripaneer.com
treasury_media.description: You are constantly facing new chapters in your lives, and making the right decision can seem daunting at times. There are times where you ask yourselves “And now, what?”. It indicates that a chapter of your life is finishing and a new one is to be written, but turning the page can be daunting. This online group coaching will help you to begin a new chapter.

treasury_media.title: Resilience Video Podcast with Unloq  March 23
treasury_media.description: Discussing the concept of resilience and how to build personal, team and organizational resilience.

treasury_media.title: Let's talk about stress, baby...
treasury_media.description: Entertaining talk on the psycho-biological effects of stress on human beings and what we can do about it.

treasury_media.title: How your worldview impacts your motivation   podcast SEP2021
treasury_media.description: A discussion exploring the roots behind our behaviours and the fundamental importance of our beliefs. After listening to this podcast, you might start "to think over your thinking" and be more intentional on which beliefs you choose to believe. Here...

profile_positions.description:
► My Clients: Private & Corporate clients clients from 𝑯𝒐𝒍𝒄𝒊𝒎, 𝑨𝒎𝒃𝒐𝒔𝒔, 𝑺𝒉𝒆𝒍𝒍, 𝑾𝒉𝒊𝒕𝒆𝑺𝒑𝒂𝒄𝒆𝒔, 𝑼𝒏𝒊𝒍𝒆𝒗𝒆𝒓, 𝑨𝑩𝑵 𝒂𝒎𝒓𝒐...
► 𝙊𝙪𝙩𝙤𝙛𝘾𝙝𝙤𝙞𝙘𝙚 offers 𝙞𝙣𝙙𝙞𝙫𝙞𝙙𝙪𝙖𝙡 𝙖𝙣𝙙 𝙜𝙧𝙤𝙪𝙥 𝙘𝙤𝙖𝙘𝙝𝙞𝙣𝙜 𝙥𝙧𝙤𝙜𝙧𝙖𝙢𝙨 grounded in positive psychology, embodiment coaching, neuroscience, and perennial philosophy. The programs are designed to use the disruptive energy of change to transform clients so they choose to reach levels of being and doing that they barely thought possible. By doing so, they unleash themselves and live their unlived Life.

► Want to know more?
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬

✎ jc@outofchoice.co
profile_positions.title: Transformation Coach (PCC, CPCC, ORSC)

profile_positions.description:
► My Clients: individual and team coaching for executive at 𝑼𝒏𝒊𝒕𝒆𝒅 𝑵𝒂𝒕𝒊𝒐𝒏𝒔, 𝑼𝑵𝑯𝑪𝑹, 𝑼𝑵𝑨𝑰𝑫𝑺, 𝑼𝑵𝑫𝑷, 𝑾𝑭𝑷, 𝑼𝑵𝑬𝑺𝑪𝑶, 𝑪𝑬𝑹𝑵, 𝑰𝑻𝑬𝑹, 𝑰𝑨𝑬𝑨, 𝑼𝑵𝑭𝑷𝑨, 𝑰𝑳𝑶, 𝑶𝑪𝑯𝑨, 𝑬𝒖𝒓𝒐𝑮𝒓𝒐𝒖𝒑𝒔
► UNLOQ  is a leading company in innovative e-coaching solutions. They use an 𝙞𝙣𝙣𝙤𝙫𝙖𝙩𝙞𝙫𝙚 𝙤𝙣𝙡𝙞𝙣𝙚 𝙘𝙤𝙖𝙘𝙝𝙞𝙣𝙜 𝙨𝙤𝙡𝙪𝙩𝙞𝙤𝙣 𝙬𝙝𝙞𝙘𝙝 𝙞𝙨 𝙖𝙣 𝙚𝙫𝙞𝙙𝙚𝙣𝙘𝙚-𝙗𝙖𝙨𝙚𝙙 𝙢𝙚𝙩𝙝𝙤𝙙𝙤𝙡𝙤𝙜𝙮 (model & method). It has been adopted since 2015 by a broad group of professional coaches, therapists and psychologists.
profile_positions.title: Executive Coach and Senior Learning&Development Consultant

profile_positions.description:
► My Clients: individual executive coaching for graduates of 𝑯𝑬𝑪 𝑬𝒙𝒆𝒄𝒖𝒕𝒊𝒗𝒆 𝑴𝑩𝑨
► Leadership Choices is a professional services firm devoted to leadership development. They offer 𝙚𝙭𝙚𝙘𝙪𝙩𝙞𝙫𝙚 𝙘𝙤𝙖𝙘𝙝𝙞𝙣𝙜, 𝙚𝙭𝙚𝙘𝙪𝙩𝙞𝙫𝙚 𝙩𝙚𝙖𝙢 𝙙𝙚𝙫𝙚𝙡𝙤𝙥𝙢𝙚𝙣𝙩, 𝙖𝙣𝙙 𝙡𝙚𝙖𝙙𝙚𝙧𝙨𝙝𝙞𝙥 𝙥𝙧𝙤𝙜𝙧𝙖𝙢𝙨.
profile_positions.title: Leadership and Executive Coach

profile_positions.description:
Co-Founder with 𝗖𝗹𝗮𝗶𝗿𝗲 𝗟𝗮𝘂𝘇𝗮𝗻𝗻𝗲 of 𝘼𝙣𝙙 𝙉𝙤𝙬, 𝙒𝙝𝙖𝙩❓ a group training and coaching program.

► Providing public speaking and training for 𝑰𝒏𝒕𝒆𝒓𝒏𝒂𝒕𝒊𝒐𝒏𝒂𝒍 𝑪𝒐𝒂𝒄𝒉 𝑭𝒆𝒅𝒆𝒓𝒂𝒕𝒊𝒐𝒏 (𝑰𝑪𝑭), 𝑺𝒉𝒆𝒍𝒍 𝑨𝒍𝒖𝒎𝒏𝒊 𝑵𝒆𝒕𝒘𝒐𝒓𝒌 (𝑺𝑨𝑵)

►Designed and deliver Group coaching programs where participants take charge of their own development, along with the chance to connect deeply with other participants and learn from their experiences and roadblocks. There are 2 programs available:

► 𝙈𝙤𝙣𝙩𝙝𝙡𝙮 𝙨𝙚𝙨𝙨𝙞𝙤𝙣𝙨 explore questions and problems faced by participants through coaching perspectives and experiential exercises. Each session lasts 90' and is online. Each month a new question/problem is offered.
►𝟳 𝘄𝗲𝗲𝗸𝘀 𝗽𝗿𝗼𝗴𝗿𝗮𝗺 guide participants to a process of personal transformation. It is very experiential, and you will be guided by 2 certified coaches through 120’ group call sessions packed with activities. In addition, you will receive individual coaching sessions with an experienced coach to deepen your learning.

► Want to know more?
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
☞ andnowwhat.nl
✎ claireandjc@gmail.com

volunteer_experiences.role: Pro-Bono Coach for victims of Ukrainian war
volunteer_experiences.description: Currently, the world is facing an active conflict that continues to inflict heavy humanitarian consequences on homes, essential infrastructure and people’s lives and well-being. As the hostilities develop, I have joined CoachHu4Good to respond to the vast humanitarian needs by offering pro-bono coaching. Through this initiative, I can help people by witnessing their pain, supporting them through this crisis, and helping them to discover better ways to deal with this crisis.

The role of the assistant or Leader from Behind is to support the Front Leaders and help them create a safe container to facilitate the learning of the participants.
Assisting the Core curriculum of the Co-Active programs (CTI) & ORSC

I provide mentoring to senior leaders in small to large corporates, helping them deal with day to day and strategic issues. My mentoring style is a combination of coaching and using leadership lessons learned during my 20+ years of diverse corporate experience.

Providing Pro-Bono employment and career coaching to unemployed professionals.

https://empoweramsterdam.com/our-international-coaches/jean-christophe-peret/

Providing Pro-Bono coaching to health professionals and their families during the COVID-19 period.

https://app.carrus.io/s/jeanchristophe-peret-1
Providing Business Coaching for entrepreneurs and start-ups
